headline: Is It Time To Reassess Ares Management (ARES) After Strong Three Year Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Ares Management is priced attractively right now, the key question is how its market price compares with the value implied by its fundamentals. The stock trades at US$169.57 after a 3.5% decline over the last week, a 2.3% decline over the last month, a 1.9% gain year to date, a 7.3% decline over the past year, and a 143.2% gain over three years. Recent coverage has focused on Ares as a large alternative asset manager, with attention on how investor sentiment...
